Endpoint Manager Parameters

Endpoint Manager Parameters Definition

class mlflow_adsp.contracts.dto.endpoint_manager_parameters.EndpointManagerParameters(*, envManager: str = 'local', host: str = '0.0.0.0', port: int = 8086, modelUri: Optional[str] = None, heartBeat: int = 5, enableMlserver: bool = False, maxTries: int = 180, timeout: int = 5)

Bases: BaseModel

Endpoint Manager Parameters DTO

env_manager

Python package manger (local, pip, conda)

Type:

str = “local”

host

Host to bind server to.

Type:

str = “0.0.0.0”

port

Port to bind server to.

Type:

int = 8086

model_uri

The model URI to load.

Type:

str

heart_beat

The internal (in seconds) to check for new model versions.

Type:

int = 5

enable_mlserver

Flag to control using mlserver rather than native MLflow serve.

Type:

bool = False

max_tries

When attempting to start mlflow serve, this refers to the number of times the api endpoint is checked for health before giving up.

Type:

int

timeout

When attempting to read streams from mlflow serve this refers to the timeout of the operation.

Type:

int

enable_mlserver: bool
env_manager: str
heart_beat: int
host: str
max_tries: int
model_uri: Optional[str]
port: int
timeout: int

Job

Defines the structure of the internal job presentation used by the scheduler.

class mlflow_adsp.contracts.dto.job.Job(*, id: str, step: Step, runs: List[Union[ADSPSubmittedRun, LocalSubmittedRun]] = [], lastStatus: Optional[RunStatus] = None)

Bases: BaseModel

Scheduler Job DTO

id

A unique (uuid) for the job.

Type:

str

step

The origination request

Type:

Step

runs

The runs associated with the job request

Type:

List[Union[ADSPSubmittedRun, LocalSubmittedRun]] = []

last_status

The last seen mlflow status of the job.

Type:

Optional[RunStatus] = None

id: str
last_status: Optional[RunStatus]
runs: List[Union[ADSPSubmittedRun, LocalSubmittedRun]]
step: Step

Step

Execute Step Definition

class mlflow_adsp.contracts.dto.step.Step(*, backend: str = 'adsp', backendConfig: Optional[Dict] = None, entryPoint: str = 'main', envManager: str = 'local', experimentId: Optional[str] = None, experimentName: Optional[str] = None, parameters: Optional[Dict] = None, runId: Optional[str] = None, runName: Optional[str] = None, synchronous: bool = False, uri: str = '.')

Bases: BaseModel

Execute Step DTO

backend: str = “adsp”

The backend to leverage for the step execution. Default is adsp.

backend_config: Dict

The adsp backend configuration.

entry_point: str

The workflow step to execute. Default is main.

env_manager: str

Defaults to local for the adsp environment.

experiment_id: Optional[str]

The experiment ID to use for the execution.

experiment_name: Optional[str]

The experiment name to use for the execution.

parameters: Dict

The dictionary of parameters to pass to the workflow step.

run_id: Optional[str] = None

If provided it is supplied and used for reporting.

run_name: Optional[str] = None

If provided it is supplied and used for reporting.

synchronous: bool = False

Controls whether to return immediately or after run completion. For parallel processing this should be False.

uri: str

The URI of the MLproject to process.

backend: str
backend_config: Optional[Dict]
entry_point: str
env_manager: str
experiment_id: Optional[str]
experiment_name: Optional[str]
parameters: Optional[Dict]
run_id: Optional[str]
run_name: Optional[str]
synchronous: bool
uri: str

Bases: object

Target Model Metadata DTO Contains metadata about the hosted target model.

registry

The name of the model registry.

Type:

Optional[str] = None

type

The designation type (stage, or alias)

Type:

Optional[ReloadableModelUriType] = None

name

The name of the designation (stage or alias)

Type:

Optional[str] = None

reloadable

The reload-ability of the target.

Type:

bool = False

name: Optional[str] = None
